alert.note: Alert for Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Yellowstone National Park (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 22 at 3:12AM MST until December 24 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches possible from north entrance to Old Faithful. 12 to 20 inches possible at elevations above 9000 feet in the Tetons and across southern portions of YNP. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Yellowstone National Park and Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains. * WHEN...From this evening through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult over Togwotee and Teton Passes. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Yellowstone National Park
